content.description: Same start as Probable Problem, both hands matched on the big low shelf.  Climb up and right making three right bump moves on a series of small crimps. Move left hand to a decent hold on the upper arte and then head straight up to the very top of the boulder to finish the problem.

Stand start with a high left hand in a sharp 3 finger pocket and right hand on the vertical edge at about waist height, pull on with a right foot high step onto the low sloper (right hand start of pocket rocket) below your right hand. Pull up and lean out right to a small right hand crimp just above head height. From here you can stand, bump the left up to an intermediate crimp and then out to the left arete; at that point you can esiely get your feet underneath you and make one last move to the lip of the boulder and an easy topout. There are probably several different betas after the first move, the upper face is featured with several small crimps/slots.

Start sitting with both hands on big jug/shelf in the middle of the face that faces the road. Climb two moves using a sharp potato chip crimp, up and left to the lower part of the lip and then top out.

Starts left of original sit to Pocket Rocket, with left hand on high small crimp underneath roof and right hand on good pinch undercling. Put left foot on good edge and right foot on small hold under roof. Pull on and make hard right hand slap for slopey dish. Once you catch dish, readjust feet, move left hand to starting hold for stand problem and then finish as for stand problem.
content.location: Left of Pocket rocket, under the small roof.

content.description: Start sitting to the right of small roof at base of slab. Start with left hand on low jug and right on sloper, get a heel hook and move your right hand to a better hold. Adjust the heel hook, then go left hand to the crimp in the roof, then bump right hand to slopey dish. Adjust feet and hit the hidden pocket over the lip. Topout as for Improbability Theory.
Climb slab to the right of the arête using hand holds for Pocket Rocket for you feet.  Can be made harder by starting to the left, closer to the arete.

The stand start of Pocket Rocket.  Start standing on right side of small roof, below blunt arete. With left hand in good (but hard to see) pocket and right hand on slopey scoop, pull on and reach high for good shelf. Mantel over bulge and then climb slab on left to top of boulder.

Start same as for Three Rights Make a Wrong on the obvious low shelf. Traverse low and right at lip of small roof using small two finger pocket and slopers. Finish up on the arête at the right side of the roof as for Pocket Rocket.

Start left of Pocket Rocket, with right hand on pinch undercling and left hand in small slot directly left of it, with a high right smear. Pull on and make a left hand move to the small crimp in the roof (used on pocket rocket), adjust the feet to get a right heel and then bump right hand up into the pocket. From there move left hand out to the good pocket out left on the slab then finish straight up, as for pocket rocket.
content.location: Left of the start to Pocket Rocket, directly under the small roof.

content.description: Perched boulder on the left across the street from the Heart boulder.  Has a few good problems.
